DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate effectiveness granulocyte colony-stimulating factor ( GCSF ) treatment thin endometrium woman recurrent implantation failure ICSI cycle
DOC.brief_title: Use Gcsf Patients With Recurrent Ivf/Icsi Failure
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective analytical study conduct private IVF center start june 2016. study recruit fertility clinic center fulfil inclusion exclusion criterion , patient subject complete history take medical fertility history include previous induction implantation failure . patient randomize two group , group A treat neupogen 30 international unit ( IU ) group B treat clexane 40mg estrogen . study procedure : ovary stimulate standard protocol ( long GnRH Agonist ) gonadotrophic release hormone ( GnRH Antagonist , least 3 follicle achieve 18 mm diameter , Human chorionic gonadotrophic ( hCG ) ( 10000 IU ) administer ovulation triggering , transvaginal oocyte retrieval perform 36-38 hour injection hCG . oocytes fertilized intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) method . thickness endometrium evaluate day oocyte retrieval syringe containing ( 300 mcg/1 ml ) GCSF ( neupogen ) infuse slowly uterine cavity 5 day ( embryo transfer ) endometrial thickness evaluate . patient receive oral parenteral progesterone luteal phase support .
DOC.criteria: male partner normal semen analysis accord world health organization ( WHO ) 2010. female partner age 36 present : athin endometrium ( le 7 mm transvaginal ultrasound ) b previous history multiple unexplained female history Asherman 's syndrome , fibroid , polyp diagnostic hysteroscopy woman sickle cell disease , renal insufficiency , upper respiratory infection pneumonia , chronic neutropenia , know past present malignancy
